description:
The demon hunter turns out to be a man controlling the opposing powers of demons and Asura Machina: the forbidden Asura Cryin`. In the face of such tremendous power, Reishiro reminds Tomoharu that he must not make a contract with Kanade. After discovering her missing sister Christina`s involvement in the demon hunter`s crimes, Ania sets out on a mission to uncover the truth. Who is behind the escalating attacks of the demon hunter? What does he want?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sonzai Suru Hazu no Nai Kinki no Sonzai
The Forbidden Being That Should Not Exist
存在するはずのない禁忌(きんき)の存在
